cause.description:
The Emergent Leadership Institute(ELI) engages Indianapolis area young people in becoming stakeholders in our community through www.helpindyonline.com(HIO) and our Community Access Points (CAPs) programs. HIO is an online volunteer center designed specifically for the needs of Indianapolis area young people. Students can find hundreds of volunteer positions from over 100 local non-profit organizations. Our CAPs program is designed for ELI to be a catalyst for introducing students to our partnering agencies in real life settings. This can be done at a school, through another youth serving organization or through ELI staff co-creating volunteer opps with students and educators.
Join our helpindyonline.com-facebook style group here: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2216053220
1. The young people of Indianapolis can make a difference in our community TODAY!
2. Students should find the cause they are most passionate about and do something about it!
3. Students that invest in Indianapolis will want to come back to Indy after college to make it their home!
cause.mission: Help Indianapolis area young people find their own path to civic engagement.
cause.name: Youth service in Indianapolis area!
